Create, build, and play @ McHacks 6

Downtown Montreal - February 2-3, 2019

Sign up for updates from McHacks 6. No spam, we promise.

Canada's Original Collegiate Hackathon

McHacks is a 24-hour annual hackathon held at McGill University in Montreal , Canada. Each year, we welcome over 500 students from schools across North America for a fun-filled weekend of workshops, hardware, food, and of course, hacking! We hope that youâ€™ll join us on February 2-3, 2019 for an opportunity to dream, develop, and deploy innovative new technologies - all in just 24 hours!
